nodes.text: Uwari beetles were six-legged beetles that lived in the Myyydril Caverns on the planet Kashyyyk. The local Myyydril tribe used domesticated Uwari beetles as a food source.
One particularly large and dangerous Uwari beetle was called Deathswarm.

Uwari beetles appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
